verbose_text: Blocking adenosine A1 receptors in prefrontal cortex of B6 mice causes a concentration dependent increase in prefrontal cortex acetylcholine, concomitant activation of the cortical EEG, and increase in wakefulness.
evidence: adenosine A1 receptors in prefrontal cortex of B6 mice causes a concentration-dependent increase in prefrontal cortex acetylcholine, concomitant activation of the cortical EEG
